name: ParryRobot

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー

PARRY ROBOT is a 3D action game where you play as a tiny but agile robot, “PAR 12-H”. Using the game’s “Parry System”, you are tasked with overcoming the mysterious, hulking “TB 001-L”…a massive automaton who’s set its eyes on your metallic hide!

♦STORY
Centuries into the future, the world as we know it has crumbled. Unnamed conflicts and environmental disasters have wiped civilization, and indeed most forms of life from the earth.
Among these ruins a little robot wanders aimlessly, as it has for many days past. Another day, another broken structure, another empty square.
But what’s this? From an abandoned factory comes signs of…life? A massive automaton fades into view but is it friend…or foe…

♦CHARACTERS
Compact Operating Robot “PAR 12-H”
The playable character, a small but agile robot.
Plucky in nature, it is unafraid of tackling larger obstacles and foes with its “Parry System”.




Hulking Automaton “TB 001-L”
A large and mysterious automaton clad in heavy steel.
Has the potential to mortally wound a lesser robot in a single strike with its deadly arsenal…




♦SIMPLE BUT EFFECTIVE
Move, jump, regular attacks, and parries. Fight your way to victory with these 4 basic inputs.

[img{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/1.gif[/img]

♦PARRY SYSTEM
Timing the Parry button to your opponent’s attacks is key.
A good parry lets you avoid taking damage, strike back, and even recover some lost HP or increase your attack.

[img{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/2.gif[/img]

♦PERFECT PARRY
A “Perfect Parry” is harder to pull off, but deals more damage.
It can even stun, offering the chance for a few free hits while the opponent recovers.



♦TIME ATTACK
The clock is ticking till you beat the boss.
Use the “Parry System” and Perfect Parry well, and aim to clear the game as quickly as you can!
